item.title: Simple Shortcode To add raw html
item.description: Simple Shortcode To add raw html This is raw HTML, inside Markdown. And here is a feather icon!!! And the Rating, which could be set up as separate hard coded short codes, so star-1, star-2, etc. There must be a way to input the number of stars as a variable.
